title: My Champion keeps freezing constantly in game
body: After this recent patch, everytime i joined a game my champion would freeze constantly, the strange part is that everything around me stays normal, only my champion freezes and my ping and fps are normal too. I've looked for solution in the internet but all i've found is people with the same problem but no solution. I tried uninstalling and installing again but the problem continued. If someone could help me, Pls!!!

replies.body: It sounds like your champion may have stopped responding to input, which can be caused by network issues like packet loss.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for this match to get an overview of what's goign wrong.  You'll also get a set of troubleshooting steps specific to your case.  That should help get you fixed up!
